article_title: Somersworth drug task force confronts heroin crisis
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox.

article_metadata.description: SOMERSWORTH — The heroin crisis is a community problem that requires a community solution and thinking outside the box, according to Somersworth Mayor Dana Hilliard.Hilliard spoke following a forum Thursday at which residents packed the Council Chambers as the Mayor’s Drug Task Force and a panel of experts tried to answer questions, provide information and listen to the community's concerns.“This is an epidemic and the only way we will solve it is by working together,
article_metadata.author: Judi Currie jcurrie@fosters.com
